method.name: create_document
method.description: Creates a new empty document. [param canvas_item] is used to rendering the document.

method.name: create_document_from_path
method.description: Creates a new document and loads it's source from [param path]. [param canvas_item] is used to rendering the document.

method.name: create_document_from_rml_string
method.description: Creates a new document and loads it's source from [param string]. [param canvas_item] is used to rendering the document.

method.name: create_element
method.description: Creates an element of type [param tag_name]. Must add to the document with [method RMLElement.append_child].

method.name: document_process_event
method.description: Issue a [class InputEvent] to the document's context.

method.name: free_rid
method.description: Tries to free an object in the RMLServer.

method.name: get_document_root
method.description: Gets a [class RMLElement] reference to the document's root element.

method.name: load_font_face_from_buffer
method.description:
Loads a font face file from buffer array.
Pass [code]true[/code] to [param fallback_face] to use this font face as fallback for unrecognized glyphs.
Returns [code]true[/code] when loaded successfully.

method.name: load_font_face_from_path
method.description:
Loads a font face file from path.
Pass [code]true[/code] to [param fallback_face] to use this font face as fallback for unrecognized glyphs.
Returns [code]true[/code] when loaded successfully.
